com.arjuna.jta
Interface JTA_XAConnectionRecovery

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArjunaJDBC2RecoveryConnection, ArjunaJDBC2DynamicRecoveryConnection
public interface JTA_XAConnectionRecovery

XA connection implementations must provide an implementation of this class.

Since:
JTS 1.2.4.
